mapper.select: SELECT pmg.id, pmg.work_cycle as workCycle, pmg.material_id as materialId, pm.name materialName, pmg.material_type materialType, pmg.count, pmg.grant_target as grantTarget, pmg.grant_target_name as grantTargetName, oap.name as grantTargetOrgName, pmg.grant_target_type as grantTargetType, pmg.grantor, pmg.grantor_agency as grantorAgency, oa.name agencyName, pmg.grant_date as grantDate, pmg.receiver, pmg.remarks FROM publicity_material_grant pmg LEFT JOIN publicity_material pm ON pmg.material_id = pm.id LEFT JOIN org_agency oa ON pmg.grantor_agency = oa.id LEFT JOIN org_agency oap ON pmg.grant_target = oap.id WHERE oa.is_delete = 0 AND pmg.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT SUM(count) as reduce FROM publicity_material_grant WHERE material_id = #{id})a, (SELECT count as total FROM publicity_material WHERE id = #{id})b
